item1.smaller: Fugger becomes the owner of Salzburgian and Tyrolese mines and the Austrian mint
item1.content: After this transaction he boosted the extraction of silver and multiplied the mint's production 25 times.

item2.content: Fascinated by the copper resources of Hungary, Fugger and Jan Thurzo founded a trading company - Ungarischer Handel. Soon the company controlled the majority of Hungarian mines.

item4.content: In that year, Fugger deponed up to 15'000 florins for building homeless shelters.

item5.content: Fuggerei is an Augsburg district built and founded by Jacob Fugger. This part of the city was another homeless shelter where the poorest could rent a flat for a pocket-size rent (around 0,88â‚¬ in today's currency).
